tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SocialMediaMetrics ( 
    post_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    post_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, 
    likes INT, 
    shares INT, 
    comments INT 
);

CREATE TABLE PostMetrics (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    post_date TIMESTAMP,
    impressions INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes INT,
    comments INT
);

CREATE TABLE engagements (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
    interaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE social_media_platform (
  platform_id INT primary key,
  platform_name VARCHAR(50) not null,
  followers_count INT,
  engagement_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE post_metrics (
  post_id INT primary key,
  platform_id INT references social_media_platform(platform_id),
  post_date DATE,
  likes_count INT,
  shares_count INT,
  comments_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE campaign_metrics (
  campaign_id INT primary key,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50) not null,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  reach_count INT,
  conversion_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE influencer_metrics (
  influencer_id INT primary key,
  influencer_name VARCHAR(50) not null,
  followers_count INT,
  engagement_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_accounts (
    account_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_name VARCHAR(50),
    followers_count INT,
    posts_count INT,
    engagement_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE social_media_posts (
    post_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    account_id INT,
    post_content TEXT,
    likes_count INT,
    comments_count INT,
    shares_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    post_id INT,
    impressions_count INT,
    click_through_rate FLOAT,
    conversion_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE brand_performance (
    brand_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(50),
    brand_category VARCHAR(50),
    total_engagement INT,
    average_engagement FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE marketing_campaigns (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_id INT,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)
